website_summaries.verdict: A popular two-piece toilet with an elongated bowl and chair height for adult convenience.
pros: Pretty design and craftsmanship with simple yet elegant lines
Some owners say it's easy to install
cons: Some complain about the handle feeling flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy & Great Functioning Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Great looking toilet. I love the flat lid on the tank. It is smooth on the sides, as the trap is not visible. So much easier to clean w/o all those nooks & crannies that trap dust. This is in my guest powder room. It also flushes very well and quietly. I couldn’t believe how quiet it is. Not at all like the cheap American Standard it replaced, that continually plugged up. When the plumber arrived and saw it, he said ‘you bought a really fancy one, which is an great choice for guests’. I got the slow closing lid & love that too:
customer_reviews.author: PLS - Bella Donna's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Is comfortable to sit on
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is exactly what I expected. Is comfortable to sit on, looks elegant in my new bathroom. I took a star away because this was shipped to me by. US Postal Service, meaning the mail carrier is not going to lug this huge box to your door (at least mine didn't) therefore, we had to make a trip to the post office to pick it up. Terrible way to ship a toilet. If you buy this toilet make sure you have a large vehicle large enough to haul it from the post office to your home........
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design, Excellent performance, quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is attractive and updated with the concealed trapway. It was easy to install and the parts and instructions were easy to use. Unfortunately, it took a second delivery because the first bowl was broken around the bottom edges where it touches the floor (the decorative area). Amazon was easy to work with to get a second shipment delivered. The second shipment was packaged very differently, with the more fragile edges protected with better packing materials. Overall, this design works perfectly, and looks great. Amazon was able to deliver four days sooner than any other supplier we found.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought two
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much I bought two! Did not come with a seat or a wax ring. Not a problem, because you can buy a high quality seat separately, and the plumber that did my install said the wax rings that come with toilets are often inferior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Serious mistake in product description
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product because of the advertised toilet height of 20.1 inches for a Kohler Toilet Model # E-669-0 inches. The height is necessary for lack of physical capacity to use lower-height toilets. When the product arrived, we observed the toilet received was a 17 inch model. We called customer service and explained the problem and we were veery cordially treated and appreciated the help. We were obliged to re-pack the item and return it which we did. The supposedly correct replacement was sent but it was again the wrong model so we declined to accept it and it was returned. The problem appears to be in the product coding by the manufacturer, Koehler.
customer_reviews.author: Alan A. Amaral

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful toilet for our half bath to match the pedestal sink. Does not come with wax ring or toilet seat....for this price it should.
customer_reviews.author: PleasantlyPixie

customer_reviews.title: 10 star- elegant- easy to clean - sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: shopped a long time for this perfect toilet! thank you kohler for this great elegant classic design. even tho my bathroom is modern those new style ones don't look good to me. thank you amazon for the free shipping. got it in 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toilet
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is beautiful, if you can say a toilet is beautiful. It's even nicer looking if you add a bidet washlet. At that point it becomes elegant. Sorry, I had to subtract stars because it is not 20.1 inches high as stated in the description. It is really 16" tall which fits ADA standards.
customer_reviews.author: Bea P.

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with toilet seat !
customer_reviews.text: Leading quality toilet. However the seller never states it doesn’t come with seat and all images show a seat. Misleading. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: The height and design make this a 10!
customer_reviews.text: Love the height for me with bad knee, received in great shape, packed well, love love the different Squared, linear design and easy clean, hidden Pipeing.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Ups won’t pick it up.
customer_reviews.text: Guess......! I thought I purchased a 20” high and it wasn’t. I ordered The same bran but 20”
customer_reviews.author: Vichele Roseberry

customer_reviews.title: Great flush power!
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have an updated toilet with great flushing power. Comfort height is great for someone having a knee replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet: terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: The tank came in cracked. Was to late to return but messaged the company anyway with no response. Had to buy another tank separately. Great once it’s all together. Looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Truth in advertising
customer_reviews.text: These toilets came without toilet seats. Every toilet I've ever bought has seats included. The seller should either disclose it or show an illustration without a seat. I've asked them to provide the seats, and if they do, I'll withdraw this one star review.
customer_reviews.author: William W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toilet!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is amazing! I have ruptured discs all through my back and neck. Both knees and shoulders are bad. A also have rheumatoid arthritis. This toilet is beautiful and has been helpful to me. I will eventually buy one for our other bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Northrop

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT COME WITH A TOILET SEAT !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had the Plummer come to install only to find out that it DOES NOT COME WITH A TOILET SEAT - yet it is pictured with one, and ITEM # 17 on the Instructions says install TOILET SEAT. Now I have to pay for additional Plummer time while I go buy a toilet seat,. NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: James Durham

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive sale
customer_reviews.text: They sold the toilet with out toilet cover They didn't express i have to buy separate When I purchased it
customer_reviews.author: cm f2f

customer_reviews.title: stunning
customer_reviews.text: very nice toilet! looks great and shipping was fast! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: OBXer4LIFE

customer_reviews.title: Toilet
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the FACT that the toilet seat wasn’t included
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned broken commode
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure that the quality of this commode is great, but the one that I ordered and received was broken in the box. I sent it back and have not reordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT POTTY!
customer_reviews.text: WE ARE A TALL FAMILY AND THESE ARE AWESOME AND VERY CLASSY LOOKING FOR A TOILET. ORDERING 2 MORE FOR OUR OTHER BATHROOMS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Paid almost $500 , delivered only the sink on Friday 6/22 as promised but missing the toilet stand!
customer_reviews.author: Ling Le

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Not flat on the very top of the sides but not too noticeable. Still beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: CAF

customer_reviews.title: The hight and strong
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled and I needed a very high toilet👍
customer_reviews.author: Maria E Molina

customer_reviews.title: Great crapper!
customer_reviews.text: Great look for upscale master bath. Comfortable and flushing is good.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Only received toilet bowl, no cistern.
customer_reviews.text: Only received toilet bowl, no cistern. Reordered ( but original was never picked up) and received a box of broken toilet pieces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, clogs very easy
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst toilet ever. For #1 is okay, but more than that and it stops up then is very difficult to unclog even using snake. It is beautiful and that's the only good I can say for it. If you would like to spend several hours trying to unclog a toilet then go ahead and get it. If not then stay as far from it as possible. If I could give it a "0" I would.
customer_reviews.author: strike three

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The short take: Don't buy it! I've purchased three of these for my house and one of them has been nothing but trouble from the start--staying runninor and not filling up at all and problems with the chain. Three problems in eight months? It's now cost as much to repair it as to replace the dumb thing. Nothing weird has gone in to it; it's just a junky thing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Alex Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Do not believe the height and false advertisement for this toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Toilet is not chair seat height, it is like a regular toilet. No liner or toilet seat came with the toilet. The Plumber just took the toilet out of the box; After paying over $450 for this toilet, I just found out that the height is a regular toilet height and not the height that was advertised . I am very disappointed with this toilet and there is no number for the dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Maa Child

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with this. Its a little more than some others but it is a very elegant design. It is so comfortable and it is VERY quiet and a quick flush. Flush and fills quickly. its really lovely and works well I highly recommend it. I like that this new design has a smooth base, it will be easier to clean. PS its sold out and on back order but you can order the base and tank separately and get them asap its what I did, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Thornwood Mom

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this brand
customer_reviews.text: We have this brand for 2 years now but it clogs almost every other day. 👎👎
customer_reviews.author: David Dao

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-6669-0 Memoirs Stately Comfort Height 2-Piece Elongated Toilet, 1.28 GPF, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteFeaturing the elegant architectural look of the Memoirs collection with Stately design, this two-piece toilet combines water-saving flush performance with traditional style. A high-efficiency 1. 28-gallon flush offers up to 16, 500 gallons of water savings per year, compared to a 3. 5-gallon toilet, without compromising performance. The elongated bowl is positioned at a convenient height for comfort and ease of use. A concealed trap way simplifies cleaning. Three-bolt installation
feature_bullets: Comfort Height feature offers chair-height seating that makes sitting down and standing up easier for most adults; Toilet height without seat: 16.5"
Elongated bowl offers added room and comfort
Concealed trap way and Clean Caps low-profile bolt caps facilitate easier cleaning and enhance design
Standard left-hand Polished Chrome trip lever included. Standard 12 inch rough-in
Combination consists of the K-5626 bowl and the K-4434 tank
Coordinates with other products in the Memoirs collection
Single-flush gravity uses the force of gravity and a precision-engineered tank, bowl, and trap way to create a strong siphon during flushing
Aqua Piston canister allows water to flow into the bowl from all sides (360 degrees), increasing the power and effectiveness of the flush
Flush valve's 3: 2 ratio harnesses the natural force of gravity and optimizes flush performance
Durable canister design has 90% less exposed seal material than a 3-inch flapper, for leak-free performance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars71 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
